text: Gaston Orbal (1898–1983) was a French stage and film actor.Lorcey p.244 ==Selected filmography== * Tricoche and Cacolet (1938) * Tobias Is an Angel (1940) * A Woman in the Night (1943) * Dorothy Looks for Love (1945) * Casimir (1950) * The Chocolate Girl (1950) * Le Dindon (1951) * La Fugue de Monsieur Perle (1952) * A Hundred Francs a Second (1953) * Au diable la vertu (1954) * Ali Baba and the Forty Thieves (1954) * House on the Waterfront (1955) * La Bande à papa (1956) * Love in Jamaica (1957) ==References== ==Bibliography== * Jacques Lorcey. Bourvil. PAC, 1981. ==External links== * Category:1898 births Category:1983 deaths Category:French male film actors Category:French male stage actors Category:People from Montpellier
title: Gaston Orbal
